getPSAppBICubeMeasures.measureFormula: countif(multiif(param(code_type, '-1') = '10', state_type = param(state_type, 'completed'), param(code_type, '-1') = '20', state = param(state, '10'), state_type = 'completed') and is_deleted = 0) / if(countif(is_deleted = 0) = 0, 1, countif(is_deleted = 0))
getPSAppBICubeMeasures.memo: 统计完成工作项的占比，反映工作项的完成情况。
getPSAppBICubeMeasures.name: 工作项完成率

getPSAppBICubeMeasures.measureFormula: countif(multiif(param(code_type, '-1') = '10', state_type = param(state_type, 'completed'), param(code_type, '-1') = '20', state = param(state, '10'), state_type = 'completed') and (end_at is not null and end_at >= completed_at or end_at is null and 1 = param(end_at, 0)) and is_deleted = 0)
getPSAppBICubeMeasures.memo: 统计已完成工作项的按期数量。
getPSAppBICubeMeasures.name: 工作项按期完成数

getPSAppBICubeMeasures.measureFormula: countif(multiif(param(code_type, '-1') = '10', state_type = param(state_type, 'completed'), param(code_type, '-1') = '20', state = param(state, '10'), state_type = 'completed') and (end_at is not null and end_at >= completed_at or end_at is null and 1 = param(end_at, 0)) and is_deleted = 0) / if(countif(is_deleted=0) = 0, 1, countif(is_deleted=0))
getPSAppBICubeMeasures.memo: 统计按期完成的工作项占比，反映工作项的按期完成情况。
getPSAppBICubeMeasures.name: 工作项按期完成率

getPSAppBICubeMeasures.measureFormula: countif(is_deleted = 0 )

getPSAppBICubeMeasures.measureFormula: countif(multiif(param(code_type, '-1') = '10', state_type = param(state_type, 'completed'), param(code_type, '-1') = '20', state = param(state, '10'), state_type = 'completed') and (end_at is not null and end_at < now() or end_at is null and 1 = param(end_at, 0)) and is_deleted = 0)

getPSAppBICubeMeasures.measureFormula: countif(multiif(param(code_type, '-1') = '10', state_type = param(state_type, 'completed'), param(code_type, '-1') = '20', state = param(state, '10'), state_type = 'completed') and (end_at is not null and end_at < now() or end_at is null and 1 = param(end_at, 0)) and is_deleted = 0) / if(countif(is_deleted=0) = 0, 1, countif(is_deleted=0))
getPSAppBICubeMeasures.memo: 统计已完成的逾期工作项，占完成或关闭工作项的比例，反映项目或团队完成工作项的逾期情况。
getPSAppBICubeMeasures.name: 工作项逾期完成率

getPSAppBICubeMeasures.measureFormula: countif((end_at is not null and end_at < now() or end_at is null and 1 = param(end_at, 0)) and state <> 40  and is_deleted = 0)
getPSAppBICubeMeasures.memo: 统计未完成工作项的逾期数量。
getPSAppBICubeMeasures.name: 未完成工作项逾期数

getPSAppBICubeMeasures.measureFormula: countif((end_at is not null and end_at < now() or end_at is null and 1 = param(end_at, 0)) and state <> 40  and is_deleted = 0) / if(countif(is_deleted=0) = 0, 1, countif(is_deleted=0))

getPSAppBICubeMeasures.name: 未完成工作项逾期率

getPSAppBICubeMeasures.measureFormula: (SELECT MAX(UPDATE_TIME) FROM TRANSITION_HISTORY WHERE OWNER_ID = dataresult.ID AND  TO_STATE = PARAM(state_type,'10'))

getPSAppBICubeMeasures.name: 状态变更时间

getPSAppBICubeMeasures.measureFormula: sum(multiif(severity =40,0.1,severity =30,1,severity =20,3,severity =10,10,0))
getPSAppBICubeMeasures.memo: 统计项目、发布版本、迭代的缺陷 DI，反映团队的开发质量。
getPSAppBICubeMeasures.name: 缺陷DI

getPSAppBICubeMeasures.measureFormula: countif(multiif(param(code_type, '-1') = '10', severity in (params(severity, ('10'))), param(code_type, '-1') = '20', priority in (params(priority, ('10'))), severity in (params(severity, ('10')))) and WORK_ITEM_TYPE_GROUP = 'bug') / if(countif(WORK_ITEM_TYPE_GROUP = 'bug') = 0, 1, countif(WORK_ITEM_TYPE_GROUP = 'bug'))
getPSAppBICubeMeasures.memo: 统计不同属性缺陷的占比情况。
getPSAppBICubeMeasures.name: 缺陷占比

getPSAppBICubeMeasures.measureFormula: countif(multiif(param(code_type, '-1') = '10', state_type = param(state_type, 'completed'), param(code_type, '-1') = '20', state = param(state, '10'), state_type = 'completed') and WORK_ITEM_TYPE_GROUP = 'requirement' and is_deleted = 0)
getPSAppBICubeMeasures.memo: 统计完成或交付的需求数量。
getPSAppBICubeMeasures.name: 需求吞吐量

getPSAppBICubeMeasures.measureFormula: countif(relation_total_test_case <> 0 and WORK_ITEM_TYPE_GROUP = 'requirement'  and is_deleted = 0) / if(countif(is_deleted = 0 and WORK_ITEM_TYPE_GROUP = 'requirement') = 0, 1, countif(is_deleted = 0 and WORK_ITEM_TYPE_GROUP = 'requirement'))

getPSAppBICubeMeasures.name: 需求覆盖率

getPSAppBICubeMeasures.measureFormula: sumif(abs(actual_workload - estimated_workload) / if(estimated_workload = 0, 1, estimated_workload), is_deleted = 0) / countif(is_deleted = 0)

getPSAppBICubeMeasures.name: 预估偏差率

getPSAppBICubeMeasures.measureFormula: sum(abs(ACTUAL_WORKLOAD-ESTIMATED_WORKLOAD))
getPSAppBICubeMeasures.memo: 统计预估工时与实际工时的偏差量。
